headline: FedEx AI Push Targets Post Purchase Growth As Shares Trade Above Targets
summary: FedEx (NYSE:FDX) has launched new AI powered post purchase tools, FedEx Tracking+ and FedEx Returns+, across its global network. The offerings focus on digital tracking, returns management, and customer communication after checkout. CEO Raj Subramaniam has highlighted a wider AI rollout at FedEx, while keeping a measured stance on robotics and drones. FedEx, trading at $353.43, sits at the center of e commerce logistics, and its latest AI push is aimed squarely at the high friction post...

headline: Assessing FedEx (FDX) Valuation After Analyst Upgrades And New AI Logistics Tools
summary: FedEx (FDX) is drawing fresh attention as upbeat analyst calls intersect with the launch of new AI-powered Tracking+ and Returns+ tools aimed at tightening operations and strengthening post-purchase customer relationships. See our latest analysis for FedEx. The recent AI-focused product launch lands at a time when FedEx’s share price has climbed to US$353.43, with a 30 day share price return of 20.57% and a 1 year total shareholder return of 44.17%. This points to building momentum backed by...
